PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-02292013-03-07,  TC,  ,  , 
ActPilotage Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Transport of PETER GOODWIN BERNARD, Q.C., of North Vancouver, British Columbia, to be a member of the Pacific Pilotage Authority to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years; and appointment of PETER GOODWIN BERNARD, Q.C., of North Vancouver, British Columbia, to be a part-time Vice-Chairperson of the Pacific Pilotage Authority.
AttachmentsAttachment
